Name: Death-Infused Bone Talisman
Description: Your first attack against a monster places 'Decay' on them, dealing damage every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds. Damage dealt is equal to your poison damage. Deals double damage against bosses.

Name: Ghostly Infusion
Description: Has to be equipped with at least one other artifact. After killing a monster, your next click is guaranteed to critically hit, and will deal 10% more damage.

Name: Large Scythe
Description: All non-artifact damage dealt by you is increased by 15% against Monsters (excluding Bosses).

Name: Meat Cleaver
Description: Gain 20% Critical Click Damage.

Name: Mystic Clover
Description: While on a region, you have an increased chance to find rare Monsters. The chance to find Monsters that have a spawn chance of 2% or less is doubled, while the chance to find the most common Monsters is reduced appropriately.

Name: Necronomicon
Description: After killing a monster, your poison damage is increased by 10 for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

Name: Poisoned Sword
Description: Increases your Click Damage by 10, and your Poison Damage by 5.

Name: Silver Greatsword
Description: All non-artifact damage dealt by you is increased by 10% against Bosses.

Name: Skullbasher
Description: Every other click you make deals an additional 10 (?) damage.

Name: Toxic Amulet
Description: Your poison damage is increased by 20%.

Name: Bat Wing Backpack
Description: Increases your Aura Damage by 25%, but reduces your Click Damage by 25%.

Name: Bloodstone Staff
Description: Killing a Monster grants a 10% increase to all non-artifact damage dealt for 5 seconds. Stacks additively up to 5 times. Each stack has its own duration.

Name: Cholla Spine Infusion
Description: Has to be equipped with at least one other artifact. Causes all clicks to leave a spine in the target's body. Click damage dealt is increased by 2 (?) for each spine in the target.

Name: Ice Golem's Heart
Description: Your clicks leave a stack of 'Brittle' on the enemy, increasing your Critical Click Chance against them by 5%. Stacks up to 5 times. Additionally, clicks against Monsters (excluding Bosses) with 5 'Brittle' stacks and below 10% health instantly finish them.

Name: Pristine Wolf Fangs
Description: Increases your Critical Click Chance by 10%, and your Critical Click Damage by 15%.

Name: Rakshasa's Necklace
Description: Increases passive Aura Attack Speed by 50%.

Name: Scepter of Eternal Flame
Description: On click, applies burning for 2 seconds that deals a total of 80 (?) damage.

Name: Scythe of the World Eater
Description: Gain 50% Critical Click Chance. Excess critical chance is converted to Critical Click Damage (unlimited).

Name: Twin Kamas
Description: Counts as two artifacts, therefore requires two free slots to use. After clicking on a monster, strike again after a 1s delay. The second attack can critically hit, as well as apply on-hit effects (such as poison).

Name: Will of the Ancients
Description: Your poison damage can now critically strike. The probability is calculated using your Critical Click Chance, and the damage using your Critical Click Damage.

Name: Transcendence
Description: Requires three artifact slots to equip. While on a Region, you don't deal any damage. Instead, each click you make on a Monster will instantly defeat them.

Name: Dull Knife
Description: Increases your Critical Click Chance by 5%.

Name: Dull Sword
Description: Increases your Click Damage by 3.

Name: Large Stinger
Description: Increases your Poison Damage by 5.

Name: Lightning Bolt
Description: Clicking on an enemy 3 times within 0.5 (?) seconds deals a bonus 20 (?) damage.

Name: Obsidian Sword
Description: Increases your Click Damage by 20, and your Critical Click Damage by 20%.

Name: Sly Snake Orb
Description: Increases your Click Damage by 20, and your Aura Attack Speed by 10%.

Name: Strong Badge of Luck
Description: Increases your Click Damage by 20, and your Critical Click Chance by 10%.

Name: Tiny Venom Sac
Description: Increases your Poison Damage by 1.

Name: Titan's Crown
Description: All experience gained is increased by 30%.

Name: Trinket of Haste
Description: Quests take 25% less time to complete.

Name: Writ of Excellence
Description: Blessings on you have a doubled effectiveness.

Name: Poisoned Naga Knife
Description: Clicks against Monsters deal additional damage equal to 5% of their maximum health. Does not work against Bosses.

Name: Naginata
Description: If you would deal 90% or more of an Enemy's health with a single click, gain double experience, 1 Gold and a 20 increase to Click Damage for 10 seconds. The damage increase bonus does not stack.

Name: Gladiator's Trident
Description: All damage dealt is increased by 50% for the first few seconds in combat. Against Monsters, the duration is 2 seconds; against Bosses - 5 seconds. The duration is refreshed each time you kill a Monster.

Name: Bladed Fans
Description: For the first 5 seconds in combat with an Enemy, you cannot deal damage to them, and instead accumulate damage. After 5 seconds, explode dealing damage to the enemy. Damage dealt is equal to 200% of the accumulated damage.

Name: Medusa Amulet
Description: While on a Region, each monster you kill increases your Click Damage by 2, Critical Click Chance by 1% and Critical Click Damage by 1%. Stacks up to 20 times. Leaving the region removes all stacks.

Name: Gold-Tipped Spear
Description: Convert your Poison Damage into Click Damage. For each 1 Poison Damage converted, gain 1 Click Damage. Additionally, for each 10 Poison Damage converted, gain 1% Critical Click Damage.

Name: Vial of Plague
Description: Every third Click you make against the same enemy deals bonus damage based on their maximum health. Against Monsters, deals 6% of their health. Against Bosses, deals 1% of their health.
